title: Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, brown and 3 reds applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 48 x 40 cm (18 7/8 x 15 3/4 in.)
Repeat H x W: 28.6 x 29.8 cm (11 1/4 x 11 3/4 in.)

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, brown and 3 reds applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-56.
